title: Provided if SRS is undertaken by a Federation, Co-Op
clause_text: Provided if SRS is undertaken by a Federation, Co-Op. Housing society consisting of members who are serving or retired State Govt. Employees / Employees of the State Govt. Undertakings / Employees of local bodies of State Government for providing housing to its members, such tenements which are generated over and above the tenements to be provided to the existing eligible hutment dwellers, shall be handed over back to the said Federation / Co.-operative Housing Society for providing housing to its above mentioned members and subject to further additional terms and conditions as would be imposed by the CEO, SRA to ensure adequate membership of class III and class IV employees.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
